Summary: started out as three close lights then formed three lights then 3 lights appeared
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 11:25 (23:25) local was looking out the window and saw a bright red light headed in a south westerly direction approximately 3 thousand feet (3,000 feet),moving very slowly with no sound, it had a green, red and white light, then, then the lights slowly disappeared, for a five (5) minutes then the object headed in an easterly direction, very slowly again then disappeared. I am an Air Force veteran and know all the aircraft. Triangle shape and and no noise,Sorry no photos picture was very out of focus, I couldn't make out the shape.
